Traveling with friends

Leila

Loves architecture and good coffee. Always finds the prettiest side streets.

Britta

A museum enthusiast who walks faster than everyone else. Keeps the itinerary organized.

Abbi

A huge hiker and adventurer of the group. Brings the group to the best hidden spots.
